CustomField.formula: CASE(Task_Type__c, "Application Review Task", "OPS", "Final Application Review Task", "OPS", "FIOL Send Task", "OPS", "Final Engineering Review Task", "ENG", "Initial Technical Review Task", "ENG", "Post-Inspection Cure Action (MR2) Task", "ENG", "Pre-Inspection Cure Action (MR1) Task", "ENG", "SOW Mid Review Task", "ENG", "Post-Inspection Task", "INSP", "Pre-Inspection Task", "INSP", "SOW Pre-Inspection Task", "INSP", "QAQC Post-Inspection Task", "QAQC", "QAQC Pre-Inspection Task", "QAQC", "M&V Plan Development Task", "M&V", "Post-Installation M&V Report Task", "M&V", "Pre-Installation M&V Report Task", "M&V", "Invalid Task Type")
CustomField.label: Task Type Category
